articles.author: John-Paul Ford Rojas
articles.title: Bank of England's Andrew Bailey warns EU against 'dubious' attempt to grab multi-trillion clearing business - Sky News
articles.description: Mr Bailey said arm-twisting banks and traders into taking business away from London would be resisted very firmly.
